result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
9:35 AM Prosecuting attorney Alexander Huber in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Brandon A. Thomas not in court, in custody. Attorney Joseph Corcoran in court for Brandon A. Thomas. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: DE is currently in custody at Waupun Correctional Institution and a writ was not prepare for the DE to appear today. Court adjourns. State to prepare writ.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 18, 2022 at 10:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Brandon A. Thomas
Current: Dodge Correctional, PO Box 700, Waupun, WI 53963 United States  (Effective: 09-13-2022)
Prior: 6823 - 27th Avenue, #3, Kenosha, WI 53143 United States

Defendant Brandon A. Thomas appeared with Attorney Joseph Corcoran.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Alexander Huber appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Case bound over.   Information filed, reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered.  Bond continued.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 5, 2022 at 09:30 am.

01:22 - 01:23 PM  Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State under supervision of Attorney Burgoyne.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Joseph Corcoran. Clerk PU.   Defendant requests preliminary hearing within 10 days; set before Commissioner on June 15, 2022 at 09:15 am.  Bond continued as previoulsy set. (see previous bond entry).

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 09:37 AM Defendant Brandon A. Thomas in court, in custody.  Attorney Zachary L Brost appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
* Comply with the sex offender registry
